channel.title: Microsoft Developer Blogs
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, announcements, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Securing your Azure deployments with PSRule】使用 PSRule 保护 Azure 部署
item.description: 【PSRule for Azure is a powerful tool designed to validate your Azure Infrastructure as Code (IaC). PSRule runs checks based on the Well-Architected Framework, helping you ensure your Azure solutions follow security best practices. See how to integrate PSRule into your workflow, and catch security issues in your IaC templates early.】PSRule for Azure 是一款功能强大的工具，旨在验证 Azure 基础结构即代码 (IaC)。 PSRule 基于架构完善的框架运行检查，帮助你确保 Azure 解决方案遵循安全最佳实践。了解如何将 PSRule 集成到您的工作流程中，并尽早发现 IaC 模板中的安全问题。

item.title: 【Customer Case Study: KPMG Clara AI and Microsoft’s Semantic Kernel】客户案例研究：KPMG Clara AI 和 Microsoft 的语义内核
item.description: 【Today we’re featuring KPMG on our Semantic Kernel blog for their work on Clara AI in KPMG. You can learn more about the solution here: KPMG Partnership with Microsoft’s Semantic Kernel Here’s a quote from KPMG on the partnership, “Microsoft and KPMG entered a strategic alliance to modernize the work of KPMG professionals.】今天，我们在 Semantic Kernel 博客上重点介绍毕马威 (KPMG) 在毕马威 (KPMG) 在 Clara AI 方面的工作。您可以在此处了解有关该解决方案的更多信息：毕马威与微软语义内核的合作关系以下是毕马威关于合作伙伴关系的引述：“微软和毕马威建立了战略联盟，以实现毕马威专业人员的工作现代化。

item.title: 【New C++ features in Visual Studio v17.11】Visual Studio v17.11 中的新 C++ 功能
item.description: 【Visual Studio 2022 version 17.11 is here and comes with a host of new features for C++ developers. We’ve made improvements across our toolchain, Unreal Engine support, Build Insights, CMake debugger, and more. This post gives a quick overview of what’s available;】Visual Studio 2022 版本 17.11 现已发布，为 C++ 开发人员提供了许多新功能。我们对工具链、虚幻引擎支持、Build Insights、CMake 调试器等进行了改进。这篇文章简要概述了可用的内容；

item.title: 【New Azure DevOps Server Roadmap】新的 Azure DevOps 服务器路线图
item.description: 【While we recommend our hosted service for most customers due to its scalability and flexibility, we understand the importance of the on-premises version for many of our customers. Therefore, we remain committed to providing support and improvement for both versions. Previously,】虽然我们因其可扩展性和灵活性而向大多数客户推荐我们的托管服务，但我们了解本地版本对于许多客户的重要性。因此，我们仍然致力于为这两个版本提供支持和改进。之前，

item.title: 【Public preview of SharePoint Framework 1.20 – First release of upcoming features】SharePoint 框架 1.20 的公共预览版 – 即将推出的功能的第一个版本
item.description: 【We are excited to announce the first preview of the upcoming SharePoint Framework 1.20. This time focus is primarily on the Microsoft Viva platform capabilities.】我们很高兴地宣布即将推出的 SharePoint Framework 1.20 的第一个预览版。这次的重点主要是 Microsoft Viva 平台功能。

item.title: 【Another tribute to Microsoft history hiding in Building 41】隐藏在 41 号楼​​的另一项对微软历史的致敬
【New debugging and diagnostic features】新的调试和诊断功能
item.description: 【Debugging and diagnostics are vital skills for any developer, but they can also be difficult and time-consuming to get proficient . That’s why we’ve added some fantastic new features and enhancements to Visual Studio 2022 v17.11 that will help you find and resolve bugs faster and easier than ever before.】调试和诊断对于任何开发人员来说都是至关重要的技能，但要精通它们也可能很困难且耗时。因此，我们在 Visual Studio 2022 v17.11 中添加了一些出色的新功能和增强功能，以帮助您比以往更快、更轻松地查找和解决错误。

item.title: 【What does ERROR_KEY_DELETED mean?】ERROR_KEY_DELETED 是什么意思？
item.description: 【You now have a handle to a key that doesn't exist, and there's nothing you can do with it.】现在，您拥有了一个不存在的密钥的句柄，并且您无法使用它执行任何操作。

item.title: 【Supercharge your testing experience with MSTest.Analyzers】使用 MSTest.Analyzers 增强您的测试体验
item.description: 【MSTest ships with extensive suite of code analyzers to help you write well-formed, performant and error free tests.】MSTest 附带了广泛的代码分析器套件，可帮助您编写格式良好、高性能且无错误的测试。

item.title: 【New Boards Hub Rollout Update】新板中心推出更新
item.description: 【Back in March, we shared an update on our initiative to make the New Boards Hub the default experience for all organizations. However, that rollout was delayed as we shifted priorities for several months. Today, we’re excited to announce that the rollout of the New Boards Hub is back on track.】早在三月份，我们就分享了有关使新董事会中心成为所有组织的默认体验的计划的最新信息。然而，由于我们将优先事项转移了几个月，该推出被推迟了。今天，我们很高兴地宣布新董事会中心的推出已重回正轨。
